name: MEANS (Medical Educational And Nature Services)

address: Towards NFC Road opp Lions Club Meerpet Bus stop

briefDescription: MEANS is a Non-Government organization working for poor with a vision of establishing a society for all ages and mission of being number one NGO’s in the health sector. The agency has already won two awards as the best NGO by State Government of Andhra Pradesh, by Disable welfare Department, State Bank of India, Bharath Electronic Ltd., Nacharam, MAA TV, Vasudha FoundationMEANS has been serving elders since the past 12 years. MEANS started small with just 4 members and now run a home that has 150 inmates. MEANS is registered under Society Act 1994-Section 12A, U/s. 80G of Income Tax – Life Time, and F.C.R.A. Our main objective is to provide quality services to the destitute elders with respect and dignity in the final phase of their life

address: Towards NFC Road opp Lions Club Meerpet Bus stop
